name: Major Bren Derlin
Lore: 'Hero of Nentan. Supervised construction of Echo Base on Hoth. Head of base security. At the Mos Eisley Cantina, everyone knows his name.',
Text: 'While on Hoth, opponent may not ''react'' to any Echo site, and Derlin may use 1 Force to cancel Breached Defenses. While at Cantina, power +1 and may use 1 Force to cancel Local Trouble.',
